item.title: ä½è¿ç®— bit operation
item.description: ä½è¿ç®— bit operation # IP åˆ° CIDR ... #!/usr/bin/env python # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- def ipToCIDR(ip, range): """ :type ip: str :type range: int :rtype: List[str] """ ipInt = ipToInt(ip) ans = [] x = 0 while x < range: zeros = countZeros(ipInt + x) while x + (1<<zeros) > range: zeros -= 1 ans.append(intToIp(ipInt + x) + "/" + str(32 - zeros)) x += 1<<zeros return ans def ipToInt(ip): ans = 0 for idx, part in enumerate(ip.

item.title: é“¾è¡¨ linked list
item.description: é“¾è¡¨ linked list # åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªæœ‰åºåˆ—è¡¨ ... /** * Definition for singly-linked list. * type ListNode struct { * Val int * Next *ListNode * } */ func mergeTwoLists(l1 *ListNode, l2 *ListNode) *ListNode { result := &ListNode{} preHead := result for (l1 != nil && l2 != nil){ if l1.Val < l2.Val { preHead.Next = l1 l1 = l1.Next } else { preHead.Next = l2 l2 = l2.Next } preHead = preHead.
